title: Multi Artha Pratama Increased Capital Participation Shares of PT Pantai Indah Kapuk Dua Tbk.
body: Multi Artha Pratama increased its capital participation in PT Pantai Indah Kapuk Dua Tbk. by transacting 385,356,454 shares at IDR 12,975.0 per share, totaling IDR 5,008,382,418,010. This transaction raised Multi Artha Pratama's holding from 14,838,980,935 shares to 15,224,337,389 shares. The purpose was to increase capital participation in the company.
company_name: PT Pantai Indah Kapuk Dua Tbk.

title: Garuda Multi Investama Buy Shares of PT Garuda Metalindo Tbk.
body: Garuda Multi Investama acquired 45,000,000 shares of PT Garuda Metalindo Tbk. (BOLT.JK) at an average price of IDR 1,000 per share, totaling IDR 45,000,000,000. This transaction increases Garuda Multi Investama's stake from 1,350,000,000 to 1,395,000,000 shares, reflecting an increase in operator shares. The purchase occurred on December 12, 2025.

title: Infiniti Wahana Sell Shares of Steady Safe Tbk
body: Infiniti Wahana sold 587,900 shares of Steady Safe Tbk (SAFE.JK) at IDR 444 per share. This transaction reduces their holding from 464,597,013 shares to 464,009,113 shares, a decrease of 587,900 shares. The stated purpose is 'Sale'.
